docs.snippet: Since Capt. GIBSON'S return to this city from the States, he has addressed the Tabernacle congregation several times. He seems to have considerable faith in Mormonism, for the present week sees him starting on a mission to the Orient.

headline.main: AFFAIRS IN UTAH.; Capt. Gibson Gone on a Mission to the East Indies Deaths in the Territory The New Superintendent of Indian Affairs The Weather, &c. From Arizona. PLAN OF THE REVOLUTIONISTS INDIAN DEPREDATIONS.

headline.main: THE COUNTY DEPOSITS.; THE COMMITTEE AND THE MAYOR.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Supervisors Committee of Inquiry in relation to the county deposits, held another meeting yesterday afternoon, when it was expected the Mayor would be present. After the Committee had been in session some time, Mr. J.B. AULD, the Mayor's Chief Clerk, appeared and stated that the Mayor was engaged presiding at meeting of the Commissioners of Health.

headline.main: AFFAIRS IN FRANCE.; The Change in the Organic Law of the Empire-What has Brought it About--The Emperor's Cabinet--The Health of the Empress & c.

docs.lead_paragraph: After a month's parturition the long-looked for and long promised change in the organic law of the Empire has been realized. The "crowning of the edifice," that vague maximum of political perfection so often promised by the Emperor in his moments of magnanimity, has arrived at "the commencement of the end." From the condition of the one-man power we have suddenly passed into, that of the semi-parliamentary.

headline.main: THE JAPANESE HOMEWARD BOUND.; Voyage of the Niagara from Loando to the Island of Java. Employments and Habits of the Japanese--Formal Visit to the Dutch Authorities at Batavia---Feasting and Dancing.Description of Batavia and theBatavians.

docs.snippet: Democratic institutions are now on their trial in America. It Would be a strange coincidence if the same year should witness the accomplishment of Italian unity under a constitutional monarchy and the disruption of a far mightier Union under the...

headline.main: DISUNION AS VIEWED ABROAD.; HOW ENGLAND AND FRANCE WILL REGARD A SOUTHERN CONFEDERACY. THE FINANCIAL CRISIS.

docs.lead_paragraph: Democratic institutions are now on their trial in America. It Would be a strange coincidence if the same year should witness the accomplishment of Italian unity under a constitutional monarchy and the disruption of a far mightier Union under the dislocating agency of Federal Republicanism. WASHINGTON, like ALEXANDER, troubled in his last days by misgivings as to the solidity of his own workmanship.

docs.snippet: The South American and New-Granadian mails from the interior not being due till to-morrow, I have but little to write to-day.

headline.main: OUR PANAMA CORRESPONDENCE.; NEW GRANADA. NAVAL NEWS SOUTHERN OFFICERS SECEDING THE REVOLUTION INDEPENDENCE DAY IN PANAMA.

docs.lead_paragraph: The South American and New-Granadian mails from the interior not being due till to-morrow, I have but little to write to-day.
